    • Method Detail

      • issueBan

        public void issueBan(PlayerReference player,
                     java.lang.String reason)
        Issue a permanent ban for this player with a given reason
        Parameters:
        player - the Player being banned
        reason - the reason for the ban

      • issueBan

        public void issueBan(Ban ban)
        Issues a ban using the given Ban
        Parameters:
        ban - the Ban to be issued

      • issueBan

        public void issueBan(PlayerReference player,
                     java.lang.String reason,
                     java.lang.String time)
        Issue a temporary ban.
        Parameters:
        player - the PlayerReference being banned
        reason - the reason for the ban
        time - The time component must be NUMBER HOUR/DAY/WEEK/MONTH.
        Example: /ban player Being incredibly stupid 5 HOURS If you put nothing as time unit, it will evaluate as HOURS!

      • issueIpBan

        public void issueIpBan(PlayerReference player,
                       java.lang.String reason)
        Ban player by IP
        Parameters:
        player - the PlayerReference who's IP is being banned
        reason - the reason for the ban

      • issueIpBan

        public void issueIpBan(PlayerReference player,
                       java.lang.String reason,
                       java.lang.String time)
        Issue an IP Ban with the given amount of time
        Parameters:
        player - the PlayerReference who's IP is being banned
        reason - the reason for the ban
        time - The time component must be NUMBER HOUR/DAY/WEEK/MONTH.
        Example: /ban player Being incredibly stupid 5 HOURS If you put nothing as time unit, it will evaluate as HOURS!

      • issueIpBan

        public void issueIpBan(PlayerReference player,
                       java.lang.String reason,
                       long bantime)

      • isBanned

        public boolean isBanned(java.lang.String subject)
        Check if banned and unban if ban has expired. Returns true if still banned, false otherwise. THIS WILL ALSO WORK FOR IP!
        Parameters:
        subject - the uuid/ip of the subject who was banned
        Returns:
        true if banned; false if not

      • isIpBanned

        public boolean isIpBanned(java.lang.String ip)
        Check if the given IP is banned
        Parameters:
        ip - the IP address
        Returns:
        true if banned; false if not

      • getBanFromName

        public Ban getBanFromName(java.lang.String player)
        Gets a Ban for a given player's name
        Parameters:
        player - the name of the player
        Returns:
        the Ban if exists; null otherwise

      • getBan

        public Ban getBan(java.lang.String uuid)
        Gets a Ban for a given player's uuid
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • unban

        public void unban(java.lang.String subject)
        Unban a subject, player or ip
        Parameters:
        subject - the uuid/ip of the subject

      • unban

        public void unban(PlayerReference player)
        Unban this player (this will NOT work with IPBans!)
        Parameters:
        player - the PlayerReference to unban

      • getAllBans

        public Ban[] getAllBans()
        Get all bans
        Returns:
        an Array of Ban(s)

      • getAllBans

        public Ban[] getAllBans(BanType banType)
        Get all bans of a certain BanType
        Parameters:
        banType - The BanType the ban will be sorted by
        Returns:
        an Array of Ban(s)

      • parseTimeSpec

        private long parseTimeSpec(java.lang.String ts)
                    throws java.lang.NumberFormatException
        Take a string and parse an amount of seconds. A String should be formatted like this: number hours|days|months Ex: 1 month and it will return the amount of seconds that contain one month
        Parameters:
        ts - timestring
        Returns:
        long amount of seconds
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException

      • reload

        public void reload()
        Reloads the bans from datasource
